Ippun de Wakaru Eiga "Donten ni Warau" K: A special collaboration with Eagle Talon and Donten ni Warau. The latter is having a live-action movie release on March 21, 2018. In the special, the Chancellor and Yoshida introduce the movie and make comments on the story.
['Donten ni Warau', 'DC Super Heroes vs Taka no Tsume-dan', 'Donten ni Warau x Mameshiba']
